name: Bebstale
description:
Bebstale is a logic game based on the rules of "cows and bulls". Go to mysterious dungeons with lots of monsters using Bebs's legs, your convolutions and 4 buttons.

Bebs is the personification of the dwarf's thought process whose cruel fate left him no choice but to go after the untold riches that are supposedly stored in the most remote ends of the cruel dungeons.

Control:

WASD + Space

Exit - AltF4

ooh

God help you to play our first project
